title: Fluffy, Fluffy Cinnamoroll, Vol. 1
description: Reads R to L (Japanese Style) for all ages. Meet the puppy with a tail like a cinnamon roll! Cinnamoroll is no ordinary pup. He loves freshly baked cinnamon rolls and uses his long ears to fly high into the sky! With his friends Chiffon, Mocha, Espresso, Cappuccino and little Milk, he’s always on the lookout for a new adventure.Oh no! Milk has disappeared through a mysterious door and only Cinnamoroll can save him! Will he find the courage to help his friend and still make it back to CafÉ Cinnamon in time for tea?
author: Yumi Tsukirino
